page.title: 02Landscape
page.content: The area we have been asked to survey is part of Crawley West Sussex. Crawley is classed as a new town built as an overspill area for London.The major part of Crawley has been built since the {Second World War}.Crawley has been divided into {14}areas, suburbs based on the neighbourhood principle each suburb containing ; {schools,shopping precinct,church and {public}house.Our area takes in parts ofthe suburbs of {Three Bridges, Pound {Hill and Furnace Green.}Crawley is located equidistant between London in the north and Brighton in the south. It relies a great deal on its excellent communications {Gatwick {Airport}being only 4 miles away,{the {M23 motorway linking London and {Brighton}bypassing the town and raillinks between the coast and London.
